subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Officiating (Sports)
Instant Replay (Sports)
lead_paragraph: When basketball officials check a TV replay late in games, the unexpected stoppage of the clock can amount to an extra timeout — and a critical strategic gift for teams.
snippet: When basketball officials check a TV replay late in games, the unexpected stoppage of the clock can amount to an extra timeout — and a critical strategic gift for teams.
